## GpioEdge enum

Bitmask representing the edge on which an alert should trigger.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum GpioEdge 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  RISING | <code>1</code> |  |
|  FALLING | <code>2</code> |  |
|  BOTH | <code>3</code> |  |
